ing: 2 (5 ounce) cans water-packed albacore tuna, drained and broken into chunks
1/2 cup low-fat creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip LightÂ®)
1 tablespoon prepared mustard, or to taste
des: "I hate ordinary tuna salad. This is a very flavorful dish that makes ordinary tuna salad become history. You can add more or less of each item to suit your taste."
ins: Mix tuna, cilantro, creamy dressing, onion, celery, relish, and mustard together in a bowl until evenly-combined.
